alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 4:15AM PST until January 05 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow continued. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 15 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch above 1500 feet, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 15 to 30 inches possible. * WHERE...Cascade mountains and valleys of Whatcom and Skagit Counties, including the Mount Baker Ski Area. The Cascade mountains and valleys of Snohomish and King Counties, including Stevens and Snoqualmie Pass and Cascade mountains and valleys of Pierce and Lewis Counties, including the Crystal Mountain Ski Area and Paradise on Mount Rainier. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM PST Wednesday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Wednesday evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Pass closures possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes
